name: Experience 1990: Hope
description:
"Experience 1990: Hope" is a proof of concept on how theory informs remediation practices for 3D galleries. It is also a narrative simulator that hopefully takes you forward to 1990 to explore culture, politics, and history. Get ready for a gallery that explores the UK rave scene, the fall of the Berlin Wall, transition in Romania and the end of Apartheid in South Africa. 

Project website: https://researchremediatereiterate.wordpress.com/
